place.name: YERBESTON
place.gazetteerText: YERBESTON, a parish in Narberth district, Pembrokeshire; 7 miles NE of Pembroke r. station. Post town, Narberth. Acres, 1,224. Real property, £687. Pop., 118. Houses, 28. The living is a rectory in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £138. Patron, Baron de Rutzen. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
